skillTree.localised_description: Certain lesser beasts thrive under a pack leader, if only just to charge them in the right direction to unleash their savagery.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Chaos Warhounds, Razorgor Herd, and Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: Harpies are scavengers and opportunists who prey upon the sick, weary, battle-worn and dying. Old Worlders consider a flight of Harpies a terrible ill omen, especially if it is in sight of a town, village or farmstead. And with good reason — for the warherds are never far behind.

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Little Morella is known for her quick temper and mischievous nature, but she is loyal to those who she calls her friends.

skillTree.localised_name: Noticed by the Lord of Excess
skillTree.localised_description: Even the Dark Prince has noticed Little Morella's fighting capabilities and has even granted her some of their gifts.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.localised_description: The Beastfather always keeps Morella close to him, for she has an excellent talent of keeping other harpies in check.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Like all other harpies, she is vicious and spiteful in her attacks, but unlike her sisters, Little Morella is not afraid to pick a fight against anyone.
She is more powerful and cunning than others of her species, which has made her almost a legend amongst her kind.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

Charge bonus: +30 for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Her screeching sounds casts a shadow of dread into the hearts of any who hear them.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -15%
	(enemy armies in local province)

Ambush defence chance: -30% for enemy armies
	(enemy armies in local province)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

A unit with the Mark of Slaanesh has:
	➕  Immune to Psychology Attribute
	➕  Strider Attribute
	➕ Increased  Physical Resistance
	 ➕ Increased  Speed
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Little Morella is a rarity amongst her kind, she has shown intelligent unmatched by any other harpy and has managed to gain the respect of the Beastfather and his dread followers.

effects.description:
Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 20% for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Soulscent" for Harpies units
	(Hero's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.
